overview: My name is Atif Yousuf I have completed my Inter Commerce and I am in B.com part 2. I have a proven track record of obtaining top places on the web more competitive keywords, with successful experience with the performance of the algorithms of search engines with extremely high rates of concrete placement for specific keywords phrases. I have introduced an approach for incorporating social media to enhance the traditional optimization SEO existing offerings.
